snippet: Mr. McWilliam’s leadership made Upper Deck an industry powerhouse at a time when baseball and other sports cards were increasingly coveted by adult collectors.
abstract: Richard McWilliam, whose innovative leadership of the trading card company Upper Deck helped make it an industry powerhouse, dies at age 59.
lead_paragraph: Mr. McWilliam’s leadership made Upper Deck an industry powerhouse at a time when baseball and other sports cards were increasingly coveted by adult collectors.

headline.seo: Richard McWilliam, Baseball Trading Card Innovator, Dies at 59
headline.main: Richard McWilliam, Trading Card Innovator, Dies at 59
